info.name: Meri Dukaan Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Meri Dukaan POS, Products, User Management, and Admin Analytics endpoints. Includes all endpoints with proper authentication, examples, and descriptions.

request.description: Get list of all stores. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Create a new store and get store ID. Public endpoint - used during user signup. Pass store name in body, API will assign a store ID. Region and city are optional.
Authenticate user and receive JWT token
Login as admin user

Create a new user account and receive JWT token. 

**New Flow (Recommended):** Provide storeName (and optionally storeRegion, storeCity) - API will create store automatically and assign storeId.

**Alternative:** Provide storeId (existing store) - use GET /stores to get a store ID first.

For SALES role, either storeName or storeId is required.
Get the authenticated user's profile information. Accessible by all authenticated users.

Update your own profile information (firstName, lastName, email, password). All fields are optional. Role and storeId cannot be changed through this endpoint - use PUT /users/:id (ADMIN only) for those. Accessible by all authenticated users.
Logout. JWT is stateless; client should remove token from storage. This endpoint is for consistency.
Request a password reset link (generic). If account exists, link is sent.
Request a password reset link for admin users only.
Reset password using email + token.
Verify Firebase ID token and issue JWT.
Verify Firebase ID token for admin users and issue JWT.
Get list of all stores. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Create a new store and get store ID. Public endpoint - used during user signup. Pass store name in body, API will assign a store ID. Region and city are optional.
Delete a store by ID. ADMIN only. Fails if store has users, inventory, or invoices.
Create a new user. Requires ADMIN. Store ID is required for SALES role.
Retrieve a list of all users. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve a specific user by their ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Update user information. All fields are optional. Requires ADMIN role. Store ID is required if role is SALES.
Delete a user by ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve a list of all products with their category, brand, and manufacturer details. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.
Retrieve a product by its SKU (barcode). SALES users see only products from their store. ADMIN/INVENTORY/PURCHASE can use storeId query parameter. Requires SALES, ADMIN, INVENTORY, or PURCHASE role.

Quickly create a product when barcode doesn't match. Automatically creates category, brand, and manufacturer if they don't exist. Requires SALES or ADMIN role. Use this when scanning an unknown barcode - SKU will be pre-filled from scan error.
Create a new product with full details. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, or PURCHASE role. All category, brand, and manufacturer IDs must exist. Use GET /admin/filters to get available IDs.
Create product with optional new category/brand/manufacturer by name, and optional initial stock. storeId required when stockQuantity > 0.
Get a product by UUID. SALES users can only access products from their store. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.
Update product. All body fields optional. INVENTORY/PURCHASE users can only update products from their assigned store. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, or PURCHASE role.
Add (positive quantity) or reduce (negative) stock at a store. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, or PURCHASE.
Delete a product. INVENTORY users can only delete products from their assigned store. Fails if product has been used in invoices or does not belong to your store. Requires ADMIN or INVENTORY role.

Scan QR code (SKU) and get product details with available stock. Only qrValue is required in the request body. Store ID is automatically taken from your assigned store (SALES users) or your assigned store (ADMIN users). Use the product.id from the response when creating invoices.

response.name: Error - Product Not Found
response.body:
{
  "statusCode": 404,
  "message": "Product with SKU UNKNOWN-123 not found",
  "sku": "UNKNOWN-123",
  "suggestion": "Use POST /products/quick-create to add this product manually",
  "endpoint": "/products/quick-create"
}

request.description: Create a new invoice with items. Store ID is automatically taken from your assigned store (SALES users) or can be specified (ADMIN users). Worker ID is automatically set to your user ID. For SALES users, storeId is auto-set. For ADMIN users, you can optionally specify storeId in the request body. Use product IDs from POST /pos/scan responses.

response.name: Error - Product Not Found
Error - Insufficient Stock

request.description: List invoices with optional filters (storeId, dateFrom, dateTo). SALES, ADMIN, INVENTORY.
Retrieve full invoice details including all items. Accessible by SALES, ADMIN, and INVENTORY roles.
Download invoice PDF file. Accessible by SALES, ADMIN, and INVENTORY roles.
Delete (void) an invoice and restore stock. ADMIN only.
Get real-time sales statistics for today. Shows sales count and total amount for the current user's store and worker. Requires SALES or ADMIN role. User must be assigned to a store.

query.description: Store ID (optional for ADMIN, auto-set for SALES)

request.description: Get inventory data for a specific store. For SALES users, storeId is automatically taken from assigned store. For ADMIN/INVENTORY users, storeId can be specified as query parameter. Requires SALES, ADMIN, or INVENTORY role.

Get purchase orders (inventory movements of type IN) for a specific store. For ADMIN users, storeId can be specified as query parameter. For PURCHASE/INVENTORY users, storeId is automatically taken from assigned store. Requires ADMIN, PURCHASE, or INVENTORY role.

Sync offline invoices created when server was down. Resolves products from names (category, brand, manufacturer) and creates invoices. Products are created automatically if they don't exist. Requires SALES or ADMIN role. Items can use names instead of IDs - categoryName, brandName, manufacturerName are required.
Get all available filter options for admin dashboard (stores, regions, cities, brands, categories, manufacturers). Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.
Get list of all categories with their IDs. Use these IDs when creating products via POST /products endpoint. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.
Get list of all brands with their IDs and manufacturer info. Use these IDs when creating products via POST /products endpoint. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.
Get list of all manufacturers with their IDs. Use these IDs when creating products via POST /products endpoint. Requires ADMIN, INVENTORY, PURCHASE, or SALES role.

Get comprehensive dashboard summary with all totals in one call: sales (total/today amount/count/items), purchases (total/today amount/count/items), inventory (value/items/low stock count). No need to fetch individual records. Requires ADMIN, SALES, INVENTORY, or PURCHASE role.
Get summary metrics for admin dashboard (total sales, invoices, AOV, distribution, etc.). All query parameters are optional.
Get sales trends over time. All query parameters are optional.
Get brand performance and distribution metrics. All query parameters are optional.
Get market share analysis. All query parameters are optional.
Get brand analytics. All query parameters are optional.
Get top selling products (SKUs). All query parameters are optional.
